author: Courtney Connley
title: Job losses could hit 47 million due to the coronavirus—these are the companies hiring remote workers today
description: Though finding a job in the midst of a pandemic is far from easy, job-search site FlexJobs has created a list of 18 companies hiring for remote positions today.
content:
As businesses continue to grapple with the economic impact of the coronavirus pandemic, the Federal Reserve estimates that a total of 47 million jobs could be lost as a result of this crisis.
